HDC finds doctor breached care standards for woman who died days after Covid vaccine https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hdc-finds-doctor-breached-care-standards-for-woman-who-died-days-after-covid-vaccine/Z5QIRWZDBRD2PG5JL6FN6MKELQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hdc-finds-doctor-breached-care-standards-for-woman-who-died-days-after-covid-vaccine/Z5QIRWZDBRD2PG5JL6FN6MKELQ/ Tracy NealA GP at an urgent care clinic failed to provide the unwell woman with appropriate care. Tue, 21 Jan 2025 02:02:48 +0000 The woman died four days after she was vaccinated against Covid-19 but it's unclear whether her death was preventable. Photo / NZME

Christchurch memorial for Ballantynes fire ransacked by thieves https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/a-christchurch-memorial-for-ballantynes-fire-has-been-ransacked-by-thieves/4R3D42IU5RFKFOKVESJFHB6BUM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/a-christchurch-memorial-for-ballantynes-fire-has-been-ransacked-by-thieves/4R3D42IU5RFKFOKVESJFHB6BUM/ Blake BennyMore than 20 plaques have been stolen from the Ballantynes fire memorial in Christchurch. Tue, 21 Jan 2025 01:49:09 +0000 Memorial plaques to the victims of the Ballantynes fire were stolen from Ruru Lawn Cemetery in Christchurch. Photo / George Heard
Top 10 for Gisborne’s Kingi at NZ Stockcar Champshttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/top-10-for-gisbornes-kingi-at-nz-stockcar-champs/GJZUOXUUQRH4BGAUH2FGH6XMBM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/top-10-for-gisbornes-kingi-at-nz-stockcar-champs/GJZUOXUUQRH4BGAUH2FGH6XMBM/ Murray Robertson'Super humbling and proud of myself for even qualifying': Kingi Tue, 21 Jan 2025 01:28:11 +0000 Gisborne speedway "local legend" Steve "Caff" McCafferty got out on the track in a car of his own for the first time in well over 20 years behind the wheel of his recently purchased classic stockcar. And the 63-year-old marked his return by winning the feature race. Classic stockcar are all about "old pensioners having fun", says McCafferty. Most of the drivers are in their 50s, 60s and 70s, and they race to the same rules as youth ministocks, which includes "no hitting". Meanwhile, McCafferty's wife Jaye was also in winning form on a track of a much different sort on Sunday - winning the women's stableford at the Gisborne Thistle AFC annual golf tournament at the Electrinet Park course.
Lake Taupō jetski death: Vincent Cornell died saving his brother’s life https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/lake-taupo-jetski-death-vincent-cornell-died-while- saving-his-brothers-life/FBHNWZWPY5GR5OK5ZALVW33KGE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/lake-taupo-jetski-death-vincent-cornell-died-while- saving-his-brothers-life/FBHNWZWPY5GR5OK5ZALVW33KGE/ Police divers recovered the body of Vincent 'Vinnie' Cornell from Lake Taupō on Monday. Tue, 21 Jan 2025 01:15:51 +0000 Vincent "Vinnie" Cornell, who died on Sunday while saving his brother during a jetski incident at Acacia Bay, was “a pillar of strength and joy” for his family.

Tue, 21 Jan 2025 01:07:22 +0000 Emergency services are at the scene where a vehicle has crashed in Welcome Bay, Tauranga.
